General_Description: '''Two of Clubs''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''There is a club not far from here that rivals this iron [[Bronze Club of Periphetes|beauty]]. Travel southeast to the edge of the [[Valley of Dreams]]. I will be waiting atop the [[Club of Herakles|bigger]] of these two clubs.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
